team_types.name: Feature Team
team_types.description: Small, cross-functional teams that own and deliver complete product features end-to-end. Responsible for the full lifecycle of their features.

team_types.name: Component Team
team_types.description: Teams organized around technical components rather than customer value streams. Anti-pattern in many contexts.

team_types.name: Platform Team
team_types.description: Teams that own shared/core components and maintain the common foundation other teams build on. Provide internal services and infrastructure.

team_types.name: Enabling/Support Team
team_types.description: Teams that support other teams with specialized skills, coaching, or specialist work (e.g., architects, testing specialists, documentation teams).

team_types.name: Undefined Team
team_types.description: Teams not yet classified into organizational team types. Used during organizational assessment or transition periods.
